messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Starboard Bow Solar Maintenance.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: AI Satellite Antechamber.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Nanotrasen Bounty Program

Central Command has issued a high-priority cargo bounty. Details have been sent to all bounty consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on the communications traffic on your station, we believe that one of the station's simple animals has developed low level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: XENOS ON BOARD i think i heard sonthing in vents....
